channel.title: Visualizations on Image Matching: Local Features & Beyond
channel.description: Recent content in Visualizations on Image Matching: Local Features & Beyond

item.title: IMW CVPR 2019: Visualization | MVS
item.description: Visualization examples for the MVS task on the Phototourism dataset. Keypoints in the SfM reconstruction are drawn in blue, keypoints without matches in red. Due to storage constraints, not all methods are listed here (this will be addressed in the future). List of methods: <li><a href="visualization/phototourism/mvs#GEODESC-STN-12-NUMKP-2048-GEODESC-STN-12-NUMKP-2048-2048-NN">SIFT &#43; GeoDesc</a> [kp:2048, match:nn]</li> <li><a href="visualization/phototourism/mvs#HARDNET-STN-12-NUMKP-2048-HARDNET-STN-12-NUMKP-2048-2048-NN">SIFT &#43; HardNet</a> [kp:2048, match:nn]</li> <li><a href="visualization/phototourism/mvs#SIFTCV2-FIX-SIFTCV2-FIX-2048-NN">SIFT (OpenCV)</a> [kp:2048, match:nn]</li> SIFT + GeoDesc [kp:2048, match:nn]
